[agentik.tools]
calculator = agentik.tools.calculator:Calculator
filereader = agentik.tools.filereader:FileReader
html_to_text = agentik.tools.html_to_text:HtmlToTextTool
http_fetch = agentik.tools.http_fetch:HttpFetchTool
websearch = agentik.tools.websearch:WebSearch
write_file = agentik.tools.write_file:WriteFileTool

[console_scripts]
agentik = agentik.cli:app
